meta.article_title: May 15, 2017 - Towel for Fast Serve Practice

towel-fast-serve-practice.probleme: Maximize the speed of the serve
towel-fast-serve-practice.diagnostic: Most players are not aware of where the first bounce is on their side of the table.

debutant.description: Spread a towel on your side of the table, about six inches from your end-line. Then practice your fast, deep serves.

exercices_complementaires.description: Try hitting the side of the table on your end-line.
